synopsis.text: This captivating anime tells the tale of Mohwa, a seasoned shaman who shares her life with her silent daughter, Nang-Yi, and her husband. Their peaceful existence is disrupted when Mohwa's estranged son, Wook-Yi, returns home after years of absence, now a devoted Christian. This dramatic shift in faith ignites a deep-rooted conflict within the family, ultimately leading them down a tragic path. Amidst the turmoil, Nang-Yi creates an enigmatic painting, 'The Shaman Sorceress,' which encapsulates their poignant story and leaves a lasting impression on the viewer.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
